description: This is an HTML file that serves as the frontend interface for visualizing database contents. It includes styling, scripting for fetching databases, tables, and data from API endpoints, and dynamic UI updates to display database schemas and data tables.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the API and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by re-fetching from the API and resetting UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles the display of tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and renders it within the content area.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs and displays an HTML table from data array.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates individual table cell HTML with special handling for objects, long text, and null values.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content when clicked, handling JSON objects and long strings.
